subject: Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Clemson University gave Coach Tommy Bowden a contract extension after ESPN reported that Arkansas was focusing on Bowden to lead its program. Terms of the extension were not available, the team said in a news release. Bowden made $1.2 million this season. Bowden led Clemson to a 9-3 record and an appearance in the Chick-fil-A Bowl against Auburn on Dec. 31.;Clemson University gave Coach Tommy Bowden a contract extension after ESPN reported that Arkansas was focusing on Bowden to lead its program. Terms of the extension were not available, the team said in a news release. Bowden made $1.2 million this season. Bowden led Clemson to a 9-3 record and an appearance in the Chick-fil-A Bowl against Auburn on Dec. 31.
